message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $6,000.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand that price is a factor, the value of this product is significant. I can come down to $10,000, which is my absolute bottom line.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. However, $10,000 is still a bit too high for my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $8,000?
